query:
SELECT 
  bt.id,
  bt.customerId,
  bt.amount,
  bt.type,
  bt.origin,
  bt.description,
  bt.balanceBefore,
  bt.balanceAfter,
  bt.createdAt
FROM balance_transactions bt
JOIN customers c ON bt.customerId = c.id
WHERE c.email = 'xkelrix@gmail.com'
ORDER BY bt.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 20;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 35dchGD4KrPJFby.root --database 2KeMNLvGvAyUJv9AEWkrsw --execute

  bt.createdAt
FROM balance_transactions bt
JOIN customers c ON bt.customerId = c.id
WHERE c.email = 'xkelrix@gmail.com'
ORDER BY bt.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 20;
